alert.note: Alert for Eastern San Gabriel Mountains; Interstate 5 Corridor; Malibu Coast; Santa Susana Mountains; Western San Gabriel Mountains and Highway 14 Corridor; Western Santa Monica Mountains Recreational Area (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued October 31 at 8:18AM PDT until October 31 at 3:00PM PDT by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM PDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Northeast winds 20 to 35 mph with gusts up to 55 mph. * WHERE...Malibu Coast, Western Santa Monica Mountains Recreational Area, Santa Susana Mountains, Interstate 5 Corridor, Western San Gabriel Mountains and Highway 14 Corridor and Eastern San Gabriel Mountains. * WHEN...Until 3 PM PDT this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects and make driving difficult, especially for drivers of high profile vehicles. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Eastern San Gabriel Mountains; Interstate 5 Corridor; Malibu Coast; Santa Susana Mountains; Western San Gabriel Mountains and Highway 14 Corridor; Western Santa Monica Mountains Recreational Area
